events.description: Mauricio Dubon singles on a line drive to right fielder Gavin Sheets.
Alex Bregman singles on a line drive to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. Mauricio Dubon to 3rd.

Yordan Alvarez doubles (8) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Gavin Sheets. Mauricio Dubon scores. Alex Bregman scores. Yordan Alvarez to 3rd. Yordan Alvarez advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by shortstop Tim Anderson.
